annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 14-297, in subsec. (a), substituted “Chapter 13A of this title” for “§ 31-2502.18”.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section and transition provisions, see § 24 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).
